description: Media files may be converted by using an `aiffmpeg` processor. An AI is used to write the conversion code, then passed along with the file to a backend processor.

cookbook_cards.title: Media Conversion
cookbook_cards.description: Converts media files using conversational language. Uploads are limited in size to 32MB.

cookbook_cards.title: Media Callback
cookbook_cards.description: Handles the callback from the `aiffmpeg` processor and displays it in the log tab.
